I started getting hooked on loot boxes as early as the introduction to them in Team Fortress 2, I used to skip school lunches and put the money into keys and boxes in the hopes of getting either an Unusual rarity hat that was either worth a good amount of money in order to sell and get into Bitcoin in it's early stages or have a decent looking one to show off to others.

I never ended up getting that Unusual item and instead spent around £2k over a few years before I was even allowed to gamble legally in the hopes of something that would probably only be worth around £70 at most.

The idea of getting money back for risking money convinced me to try actual gambling once I could use online sites.
